channel.title: SOAP Support on OWASP ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in SOAP Support on OWASP ZAP

item.title: SOAP Automation Framework Support
item.description: SOAP Automation Framework Support This add-on supports the Automation Framework. The add-on will import WSDL files containing SOAP endpoints if they are found while spidering but adding them explicitly via a URL or local file is recommended if they are available. Job: soap The soap job allows you to import WSDL files locally or from a URL.
